paragraphs: I'm a Civil Engineer and Junior Engineer currently working at Paradigm @ Infopark, Ernakulam, focusing on infrastructure projects, CAD drawings, soil layering, and geotechnical drawings.

I enjoy working with BIM tools (Revit, ACC, CAD) and exploring web development & automation—building utilities like money tracking apps, Google Sheets–integrated tools, and BIM-related scripts that reduce repetitive work.
I'm focused on becoming a future-ready engineer who can combine civil engineering fundamentals with digital tools, automation, and efficient workflows.
